tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wine_details (
  wine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  region_id INT,
  grape_variety VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  flavor_profile VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES wine_regions(region_id)
);
CREATE TABLE wine_regions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, region_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, country VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, climate VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE grape_varieties (id INT PRIMARY KEY, variety_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, color VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, characteristics TEXT);
CREATE TABLE flavor_profiles (id INT PRIMARY KEY, flavor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE wine_preferences (id INT PRIMARY KEY, region_id INT NOT NULL, variety_id INT NOT NULL, flavor_id INT NOT NULL, rating INT NOT NULL, comment TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES wine_regions(id), FOREIGN KEY (variety_id) REFERENCES grape_varieties(id), FOREIGN KEY (flavor_id) REFERENCES flavor_profiles(id));

CREATE TABLE wines (
    wine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wine_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    region_id INT,
    variety_id INT,
    profile_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES wine_regions(region_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (variety_id) REFERENCES grape_varieties(variety_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES flavor_profiles(profile_id)
);

CREATE TABLE wine_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    wine_id INT,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    comments TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (wine_id) REFERENCES wines(wine_id)
);
